typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(Order_Year = year(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumnYear
DerivedColumnYear derive(Order_Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumnMonth
DerivedColumnMonth sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		EmployeeID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		RequiredDate as string,
		ShippedDate as string,
		ShipVia as string,
		Freight as string,
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		EmployeeID as string,
		OrderDate as string,
		RequiredDate as string,
		ShippedDate as string,
		ShipVia as string,
		Freight as string,
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 derive(Year = year(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Month = month(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@OrderID == source2@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(Year = year(OrderDate)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(CustomerID,
		Year),
	Quantity = sum(Quantity),
		Freight = sum(Freight)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1

source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		CustomerID as string,
		EmployeeID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		RequiredDate as timestamp,
		ShippedDate as timestamp,
		ShipVia as integer,
		Freight as decimal(19,4),
		ShipName as string,
		ShipAddress as string,
		ShipCity as string,
		ShipRegion as string,
		ShipPostalCode as string,
		ShipCountry as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderID as integer,
		ProductID as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(19,4),
		Quantity as integer,
		Discount as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@OrderID == source2@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		OrderID = source1@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		EmployeeID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipVia,
		Freight,
		ShipName,
		ShipAddress,
		ShipCity,
		ShipRegion,
		ShipPostalCode,
		ShipCountry,
		ProductID,
		UnitPrice,
		Quantity
	)) ~> sink1
